mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, description, image_url, activity_id, original_price, seckill_price, total_stock, seckill_stock, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{activityId}, #{originalPrice}, #{seckillPrice}, #{totalStock}, #{seckillStock}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, activity_id = #{activityId}, original_price = #{originalPrice}, seckill_price = #{seckillPrice}, total_stock = #{totalStock}, seckill_stock = #{seckillStock}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
